title: Improved diagnosis of arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy using electrocardiographic deep-learning
details: RT Carrick, ED Carruth, A Gasperetti, B Murray… - Heart Rhythm, 2024
abstract: Background Arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy (ARVC) is a rare genetic heart disease associated with life-threatening ventricular arrhythmias. Diagnosis of ARVC is based on the 2010 Task Force Criteria (TFC), application of …
